Content: The National Police Commission has taken steps to promote 2,891 male and female police constables on the instructions of IGP Pujith Jayasundara. Accordingly 1,783 officers have been promoted from Police Constables to Sergeants. 334 women officers have been promoted from women police constable to women police sergeants. 553 have been promoted from police sergeants to the sub police inspector posts and 76 women officers have been promoted from women police sergeants to the post of women sub inspectors. Apart from these, 145 promotions have been given to police drivers.
